-- | This combines regex-tdfa with utf8-string to allow searching over UTF8 encoded lazy bytestrings.
--   
--   This combines regex-tdfa with utf8-string to allow searching over UTF8
--   encoded lazy bytestrings.
@package regex-tdfa-utf8
@version 1.0

module Text.Regex.TDFA.UTF8
newtype Utf8
Utf8 :: ByteString -> Utf8
utf8 :: Utf8 -> ByteString
instance Show Utf8
instance Read Utf8
instance Eq Utf8
instance Ord Utf8
instance RegexContext Regex Utf8 Utf8
instance RegexLike Regex Utf8
instance RegexMaker Regex CompOption ExecOption Utf8
instance Uncons Utf8
instance Extract Utf8
